strongs_def: to end, whether intransitive (to cease, be finished, perish) or transitived (to complete, prepare, consume)
kjv_def: accomplish, cease, consume (away), determine, destroy (utterly), be (when... were) done, (be an) end (of), expire, (cause to) fail, faint, finish, fulfil, [idiom] fully, [idiom] have, leave (off), long, bring to pass, wholly reap, make clean riddance, spend, quite take away, waste.
